column1: Happy Thanksgiving! This year’s celebration may look different due to social distancing...   Be safe.   Be smart.   Listen to the advice of public health experts. https://t.co/wcSiI4IgbN

On this day 77 years ago our nation lost a hero in Cook 3rd Class Doris Miller. To cement his legacy I introduced a bill that would upgrade his Navy Cross to the Medal of Honor – an act that is exceedingly appropriate and long overdue – for his heroics at Pearl Harbor. https://t.co/cEhWGecSjH

57 years ago the world stood still as we mourned the loss of President John F. Kennedy. Known for standing against those who considered American progress a threat and with those who sought peace and equality he evoked a legacy that will not soon be forgotten. #JFK

Today #SCOTUS is hearing arguments on yet another attempt to dismantle #ACA. We MUST FIGHT any efforts that will  remove health care coverage from 21 million Americans during a global pandemic and eliminate protections for pre-existing conditions for 130 million more.
I extend my warmest congratulations to President-Elect Joe Biden and Vice-President Elect Kamala Harris on their victory in the Presidential election.
